data.title: Senior Backend Developer
data.description: TechGiant Corp is seeking a Senior Backend Developer to lead our backend team.
data.key_responsibilities: Design scalable backend architecture, Mentor junior developers, Make technical decisions
data.requirements: 5+ years of backend development experience, Expert knowledge of Node.js or Python, Experience with microservices architecture
data.benefits: Competitive salary, Performance bonuses, Leadership training

data.title: Junior Frontend Developer
data.description: Augmex is looking for a motivated Junior Frontend Developer to join our growing team.
data.key_responsibilities: Implement UI components, Write clean and maintainable code, Learn new technologies
data.requirements: 1-2 years of experience with React, Knowledge of HTML/CSS/JavaScript, Basic understanding of version control
data.benefits: Mentorship program, Learning budget, Friendly work environment

data.title: Full Stack Developer
data.description: TechGiant Corp is seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to work on our flagship product.
data.key_responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications, Collaborate with cross-functional teams, Participate in code reviews
data.requirements: Experience with React and Node.js, Knowledge of database design, Familiarity with Agile methodologies
data.benefits: Stock options, Professional development budget, Annual company retreat

data.title: Backend Developer
data.description: We are looking for an experienced Backend Developer to join our engineering team.
data.key_responsibilities: Develop RESTful APIs, Design database schemas, Optimize application performance
data.requirements: 3+ years of experience with Node.js, Experience with MongoDB and PostgreSQL, Knowledge of cloud services (AWS)
data.benefits: Competitive salary, Health insurance, Flexible working hours, Remote work options

data.title: Senior Frontend Developer
data.description: We are looking for a React expert to lead our frontend team.
